publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2077 Linda Fabiani: Carers’ Rights Day—That the Parliament praises the valuable and vital role played by the 666,000 carers in Scotland; notes that the fourth annual Carers’ Rights Day is being held on 3 December 2004 and that Carers Scotland will be visiting the Parliament on 2 December; recognises that millions of pounds worth of carers’ benefits go unclaimed each year, and considers that the Scottish Executive should step up its activities to encourage better take-up of the allowances rightly due to carers in Scotland.
S2M-2077 Carers’ Rights Day (lodged on 26 November 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Jim Mather*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Alex Fergusson*, Rob Gibson*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-2077 Carers’ Rights Day (lodged on 26 November 2004) Patrick Harvie*, Bruce Crawford*, Tricia Marwick*, Eleanor Scott*, Nora Radcliffe*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr David Davidson*, Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-2077 Carers’ Rights Day (lodged on 26 November 2004) Robert Brown*, David Mundell*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Donald Gorrie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Bill Butler*
S2M-2077 Carers’ Rights Day (lodged on 26 November 2004) Shona Robison*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Tommy Sheridan*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-2077 Carers’ Rights Day (lodged on 26 November 2004) Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*
S2M-2077 Carers' Rights Day (lodged on 26 November 2004) Susan Deacon*
